trans-unit.source: Performance
trans-unit.target: Performance

trans-unit.source: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.
trans-unit.target: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.

trans-unit.source: Performance
trans-unit.target: Performance

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.
trans-unit.target: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.

trans-unit.source: Technically, performance is a non-functional requirement but treating performance as a feature will help you deliver on your users' expectations.
trans-unit.target: Technically, performance is a non-functional requirement but treating performance as a feature will help you deliver on your users' expectations.

trans-unit.source: Specifying goals, and measuring, are key factors.
trans-unit.target: Specifying goals, and measuring, are key factors.

trans-unit.source: Determine what your performance-critical scenarios are; define what good performance mean.
trans-unit.target: Determine what your performance-critical scenarios are; define what good performance mean.

trans-unit.source: Then measure early and often enough throughout the lifecycle of your project to be confident you'll hit your goals..
trans-unit.target: Then measure early and often enough throughout the lifecycle of your project to be confident you'll hit your goals..

trans-unit.source: This section shows you how to organize your performance workflow, fix animation glitches and frame rate problems, and tune your startup time, page navigation time, and memory usage.
trans-unit.target: This section shows you how to organize your performance workflow, fix animation glitches and frame rate problems, and tune your startup time, page navigation time, and memory usage.

trans-unit.source: If you haven't done so already, a step that we've seen result in significant performance improvements is just porting your app to target Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: If you haven't done so already, a step that we've seen result in significant performance improvements is just porting your app to target Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Several XAML optimizations (for example, [{x:Bind}](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt204783)) are only available in Windows 10 apps.
trans-unit.target: Several XAML optimizations (for example, [{x:Bind}](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt204783)) are only available in Windows 10 apps.

trans-unit.source: See [Porting apps to Windows 10](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt238321) and the //build/ session [Moving to the Universal Windows Platform](http://channel9.msdn.com/Events/Build/2015/3-741).
trans-unit.target: See [Porting apps to Windows 10](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt238321) and the //build/ session [Moving to the Universal Windows Platform](http://channel9.msdn.com/Events/Build/2015/3-741).

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Planning for performance
trans-unit.target: Planning for performance

trans-unit.source: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.
trans-unit.target: Users expect their apps to remain responsive, to feel natural, and not to drain their battery.

trans-unit.source: Technically, performance is a non-functional requirement but treating performance as a feature will help you deliver on your users' expectations.
trans-unit.target: Technically, performance is a non-functional requirement but treating performance as a feature will help you deliver on your users' expectations.

trans-unit.source: Specifying goals, and measuring, are key factors.
trans-unit.target: Specifying goals, and measuring, are key factors.

trans-unit.source: Determine what your performance-critical scenarios are; define what good performance mean.
trans-unit.target: Determine what your performance-critical scenarios are; define what good performance mean.

trans-unit.source: Then measure early and often enough throughout the lifecycle of your project to be confident you'll hit your goals.
trans-unit.target: Then measure early and often enough throughout the lifecycle of your project to be confident you'll hit your goals.

trans-unit.source: ListView and GridView UI optimization
trans-unit.target: ListView and GridView UI optimization

trans-unit.source: Improve [GridView](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR242705) performance and startup time through UI virtualization, element reduction, and progressive updating of items.
trans-unit.target: Improve [GridView](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR242705) performance and startup time through UI virtualization, element reduction, and progressive updating of items.

trans-unit.source: ListView and GridView data virtualization
trans-unit.target: ListView and GridView data virtualization

trans-unit.source: Improve [GridView](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR242705) performance and startup time through data virtualization.
trans-unit.target: Improve [GridView](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR242705) performance and startup time through data virtualization.

trans-unit.source: Improve garbage collection performance
trans-unit.target: Improve garbage collection performance

trans-unit.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps written in C# and Visual Basic get automatic memory management from the .NET garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps written in C# and Visual Basic get automatic memory management from the .NET garbage collector.

trans-unit.source: This section summarizes the behavior and performance best practices for the .NET garbage collector in UWP apps.
trans-unit.target: This section summarizes the behavior and performance best practices for the .NET garbage collector in UWP apps.

trans-unit.source: Keep the UI thread responsive
trans-unit.target: Keep the UI thread responsive

trans-unit.source: Users expect an app to remain responsive while it does computation, regardless of the type of machine.
trans-unit.target: Users expect an app to remain responsive while it does computation, regardless of the type of machine.

trans-unit.source: This means different things for different apps.
trans-unit.target: This means different things for different apps.

trans-unit.source: For some, this translates to providing more realistic physics, loading data from disk or the web faster, quickly presenting complex scenes and navigating between pages, finding directions in a snap, or rapidly processing data.
trans-unit.target: For some, this translates to providing more realistic physics, loading data from disk or the web faster, quickly presenting complex scenes and navigating between pages, finding directions in a snap, or rapidly processing data.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the type of computation, users want their app to act on their input and eliminate instances where it appears unresponsive while it "thinks".
trans-unit.target: Regardless of the type of computation, users want their app to act on their input and eliminate instances where it appears unresponsive while it "thinks".

trans-unit.source: Optimize your XAML markup
trans-unit.target: Optimize your XAML markup

trans-unit.source: Parsing XAML markup to construct objects in memory is time-consuming for a complex UI.
trans-unit.target: Parsing XAML markup to construct objects in memory is time-consuming for a complex UI.

trans-unit.source: Here are some things you can do to improve XAML markup parse and load time and memory efficiency for your app.
trans-unit.target: Here are some things you can do to improve XAML markup parse and load time and memory efficiency for your app.

trans-unit.source: Optimize your XAML layout
trans-unit.target: Optimize your XAML layout

trans-unit.source: Layout can be an expensive part of a XAML app—both in CPU usage and memory overhead.
trans-unit.target: Layout can be an expensive part of a XAML app—both in CPU usage and memory overhead.

trans-unit.source: Here are some simple steps you can take to improve the layout performance of your XAML app.
trans-unit.target: Here are some simple steps you can take to improve the layout performance of your XAML app.

trans-unit.source: MVVM and language performance tips
trans-unit.target: MVVM and language performance tips

trans-unit.source: This topic discusses some performance considerations related to your choice of software design patterns, and programming language.
trans-unit.target: This topic discusses some performance considerations related to your choice of software design patterns, and programming language.

trans-unit.source: Best practices for your app's startup performance
trans-unit.target: Best practices for your app's startup performance

trans-unit.source: Create UWP apps with optimal startup times by improving the way you handle launch and activation.
trans-unit.target: Create UWP apps with optimal startup times by improving the way you handle launch and activation.

trans-unit.source: Optimize animations, media, and images
trans-unit.target: Optimize animations, media, and images

trans-unit.source: Create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps with smooth animations, high frame rate, and high-performance media capture and playback.
trans-unit.target: Create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps with smooth animations, high frame rate, and high-performance media capture and playback.

trans-unit.source: Optimize suspend/resume
trans-unit.target: Optimize suspend/resume

trans-unit.source: Create UWP apps that streamline their use of the process lifetime system to resume efficiently after suspension or termination.
trans-unit.target: Create UWP apps that streamline their use of the process lifetime system to resume efficiently after suspension or termination.

trans-unit.source: Optimize file access
trans-unit.target: Optimize file access

trans-unit.source: Create UWP apps that access the file system efficiently, avoiding performance issues due to disk latency and memory/CPU cycles.
trans-unit.target: Create UWP apps that access the file system efficiently, avoiding performance issues due to disk latency and memory/CPU cycles.

trans-unit.source: Windows Runtime Components and optimizing interop
trans-unit.target: Windows Runtime Components and optimizing interop

trans-unit.source: Create UWP apps that use UWP Components and interop between native and managed types while avoiding interop performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Create UWP apps that use UWP Components and interop between native and managed types while avoiding interop performance issues.

trans-unit.source: Tools for profiling and performance
trans-unit.target: Tools for profiling and performance

trans-unit.source: Microsoft provides several tools to help you improve the performance of your UWP app.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft provides several tools to help you improve the performance of your UWP app.
